website_summaries.verdict: This upright dustpan is taller than others on the market and leaves no dust line.
pros: Pan is snug to the ground
Nice handle length at 40" will help keep almost any adult from having to bend over
cons: The pan on this upright dustpan does not rotate up and down like some other lobby-style dustpans available

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love not having to bend down to scoop up debris, and for that purpose this works really well. The bottom edge is tight enough to the floor that you don’t lose much dust as you sweep it into the container. I think that it would’ve been better if the product was hinged where the scoop meets the pole. It can be a little cumbersome to dump the scoop into the garbage without removing the pole from the scoop. Also, it would take up less space in the closet if it could hinge closed. Overall, I am happy with my purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DDCTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Works OK, but too heavy and too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, but nothing special, especially for the high price. I already had a very similar dustpan that has a plastic (instead of rubber) base that I like very much and keep upstairs in my home. I was looking for the same or similar product to keep downstairs. This one works but is considerably heavier, which makes it a bit harder to handle. I much prefer this design to those that fold up - this type is much easier to empty into the trash can, but the weight of this model means you need a stronger wrist to use it. If I can find another plastic model I am going to buy that.
customer_reviews.author: ML Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good performance.
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan satisfied my needs nicely. Stands on it's own well so I never have to bend down to pick it up. Leading edge is thin and fits closely to the floor. Handle is long enough that I don't have to bend over. I haven't found any flaws yet. More expensive than some competitors but I think well worth the cost. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: CAMr

customer_reviews.title: Makes sweeping up a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan has really spoiled me for the bend-over kind. The rubber works well at not leaving debris behind. I liked the first one so well I bought another for my workshop. I do wish the stick-on label was removable and that the dustpan itself didn't look so, well, dusty. Maybe if it was gray instead of black, it would end up being more attractive. Overall, though, I place it on my list of favorite tools I didn't know I needed.
customer_reviews.author: SandH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived promptly and as described. This is a wide, sturdy and kind of heavy dustpan. I'm used to lighter and cheaper dustpans. I feel the price is too high, but I could not find one in the stores around where I live now.
customer_reviews.author: maru

customer_reviews.title: BLOWN AWAY by the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Once it arrived and I was so impressed with the construction and quality, I immediately ordered one for my father. Worth. Every. Penny.
customer_reviews.author: H D S

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for less than a month and the plastic knobs have broke off therefore making the whole system fail . Of course there is no returns after three weeks. It’s a lot of money to pay for a piece of plastic crap
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well made RAVmag dustpan.
customer_reviews.text: The dustpan RAVmag is very well made. Works perfectly. Will last a very long time. I love that it picks up without having to sweep over and over to pick up the smallest dust/trash from the floor. Leaves no lines. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Decent pan but weak handle that easily bent. The rubber pan gets a bit floppy ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent pan but weak handle that easily bent. The rubber pan gets a bit floppy if left in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Julia San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't tip over easily. I also like the design of the little dirt ramp, it is a little elevated so it traps dirt well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very steady and easy to use. I use it in a barn so it gets rough use.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: "Love it. First dustpan I've had that lets me sweep without having to move it 5 times to get everything up."
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: It’s way over priced , it looks bigger in the picture then it actually is
customer_reviews.author: Bettina Larson

customer_reviews.title: It's very small and doesn't hold much and the rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very small and doesn't hold much and the rubber seems to soft to be rugged also the handle is too short...not what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Husband was very happy with this dust pan. It saves his back and knees!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting the rubber to be had it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the rubber to be had it is really soft and difficult to use as a dust pan
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dust pan I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dust pan I have ever used. It saves me from bending down and it works the first time. No repeatedly sweeping and moving the dust pan. I like it so most I bought another for my bird room
customer_reviews.author: Dakota's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I wish it had a spin on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product . I wish it had a spin on the bottom to easily pour garbage into can
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I bought it help with sweeping after back surgery (no bending) but posed entirely new problem of how to empty it into trash. It doesn't revolve and dump. the pan is fixed at 90 degrees. I can't stand on foot opener to open trash and hold pan over it at the same time b/c too long. Pretty useless, and darned expensive to be useless
customer_reviews.author: Comparison Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great dustpan for work everyone is pleased with way better than the others on amazon used them at my work not nearly as good.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for me and everyone at work. This is way better than the last dustpan we had before it picks up everything really well because it is right on the ground other dust pans we have had and they are not snug on the ground so don't pick up all the little stuff good. Everyone at my work really likes this and you don't have to bend over as well its great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Dupere

customer_reviews.title: Something to make my life easier....
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but it appears very sturdy and should do the job. Handle nice size. No bending. I purchased it for outdoor use. Ive had several cheap plastic ones, that don't last long. Decided to buy this, which is a bit pricey, but you do get what you pay for when you don't go cheap.
customer_reviews.author: cippy

customer_reviews.title: Better than other dustpans with handle.
customer_reviews.text: I bought another dustpan at half the price which did a reasonably good job. But I found this fit closer to the floor and left no dust line. Considering this kind of item will be in use for a long time, I feel it is worth the cost difference not to have to bend down as often.
customer_reviews.author: Norman  Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Awful Rubber Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: This rubber dustpan is awful. The rubber is heavy, and it has too much tilt at the edge, so leaves are hard to sweep into it. A much better long-handled dustpan is a "Michael Graves" design, which I bought at Target, but I think JC Penny also carries it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Better dust pan.
customer_reviews.text: It was quite a bit more expensive than the plastic ones, and the silicone rubber is staticky holding fine dust. But the lip does lie tight to the floor making it easy to sweep without that little dust line left behind. So I guess its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Loring C

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few days but works well so far. Like the way the pan hugs the ground so debris doesn’t go under it. Also like that the handle stays upright when I am doing related chores
customer_reviews.author: M. Paine

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our farm store and the employees and I think it’s pretty great. The rubber does a great job at blocking dirt from getting swept underneath it. Plus it’s a good size & lightweight. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: This dustpan is amazing! The edge is so close to the floor
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan is amazing! The edge is so close to the floor, that no dust line remains after sweeping. It is also a very comfortable height, and super sturdy. Exponentially better than other dustpans!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Best dustpan I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best dustpan I've ever had! Love that when you sweep things into it and it stays and you don't have to back up to get everything.
customer_reviews.author: patricia gunhouse

customer_reviews.title: Best Dustpan Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the greatest dustpan money can buy! No more bending over and the rubber bottom seals tight to the floor so everything goes into the pan! I love it and will recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan has been a life saver! I love that I can sweep dirt onto it and I don't have to move it back to get the dirt that might have gone under it. One of my best cleaning purchases! I would highly recommend this product! I read reviews like crazy on other dust pans and I'm glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rach08

customer_reviews.title: Good, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: It works well, I think it is a bit overpriced,
customer_reviews.author: nino

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Dust and floor debris does not get caught under pan.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cloud

customer_reviews.title: ... heal - this dustpan has been so helpful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Recently had a hip replacement and therefore have not been able to bend to the floor while i heal - this dustpan has been so helpful and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as expected
customer_reviews.text: wish it was as wide as the broom that I bought
customer_reviews.author: Achey Feet

customer_reviews.title: Best dust pan I've had
customer_reviews.text: Best dust pan I've had. A little pricey but it's great because the rubbery material it's made of, really pick up everything.
customer_reviews.author: carrib-bean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Idea to have one, No More Bending over after sweeping the floor. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Love this dustpan, as it is rubburized and "molds" to floor, therefore all the dirt actually gets picked up. No more moving it around to get all the dirt. Plus, it's all done with no bending!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Low quality materials. Does not bend. Light weight rubber. Not worth buying it. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: What an awful dustpan!
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan left a terrible yellow stain on my linoleum. I couldn't get it all out - even using SOS and Gel Gloss! Back to 'square one' getting a decent pan!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Harris

product_meta.title: Dustpan with Handle by Ravmag- Solid Natural Rubber Construction- 40” Long Handled Dust Pan- Stand Up Design- Accommodates Any Broom/ Hand Brush- Best Dustpans for Home/ Lobby/ Shop
product_meta.description:
ONE SWEEP IS ALL YOU NEED

Get Everything!

Are you tired of dustpans that never seem to work? You keep sweeping and sweeping but there is a dust line 
that stubbornly refuses to clean away? Well, this dust pan by Ravmag is sure to brush away that frustration! 
Built using a single piece of rubber, it hugs the floor perfectly leaving no gaps for dirt to escape through unlike 
ordinary plastic ones. Its lip is also thinner than the tip of a needle so that even the tiniest particles of dirt get 
swept away. That’s right, no more annoying dust lines!

Nothing but Durability!

This is the last dust pan you’ll ever need to buy! Made using a solid piece of natural rubber, the only one with 
this ultra-durable construction, you’ll never have to worry about the inconveniences of plastic. That means no 
breaking mere days after buying it. No cracking even with the kids getting to their usual cheekiness. No losing 
shape rendering it useless. Brace yourself for years and years of unwavering service!

Here’s why you’ll love this stand up dust pan:


 - Leaves no gaps for dirt to slip through. 

 - Needle-thin lip collects even the tiniest particles. 

 - 40-inch long handle eliminates painful bending during sweeping. 

 - Features a wide body to accommodate most brooms. 

 - Stands upright making it easy to use.

Whether you’re sweeping your hardwood, tiled or linoleum floors, count on Ravmag’s dustpan to make 
cleaning as effortless as it gets. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
feature_bullets: - LEAVES NO DUST BEHIND: The Ravmag dustpan is made using a single piece of rubber, allowing it to hug tightly to the floor leaving no gaps for dirt to escape.
- ONE-SWEEP CLEAN: The lip of this rubber dustpan with handle finishes thinner than the point of a needle, ensuring no dirt lines form when using a broom with dust pan.
- LONG HANDLED DUST PAN: Measuring out at 40 inches, the dust pan long handle eliminates tedious bending allowing you to work comfortably without back pain.
- ACCOMMODATES MOST BROOMS: This lobby dustpan has a wide body to work with most kinds of brooms and stands upright to make sweeping even easier.
- LASTS FOR YEARS: Being the only dustpan made using a single piece of natural rubber; it offers unmatched durability that easily surpasses that of plastic dust pans. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
